pages.text: This mod adds two mobs and a villager profession. $(br2)The looting of mob are important crafting ingredient, and villagers can trade some of the items in this mod.
Spawn in the plain biome at night, it will fly and simultaneously shoot danmaku to attack players and maids.
Spawn in the forest biome at night, it will attack players and maids.
Spawn in the vanilla village, can carry out some trading of this mod's item.
